name: MPVolumeView
desc: A slider control used to set the system audio output volume, and a button for choosing the audio output route.

items.name: var showsVolumeSlider: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the volume slider is visible in the volume view.

items.name: func maximumVolumeSliderImage(for: UIControl.State) -> UIImage?
items.desc: Returns the maximum volume image associated with the specified control state.

items.name: func minimumVolumeSliderImage(for: UIControl.State) -> UIImage?
items.desc: Returns the minimum volume image associated with the specified control state.

items.name: func setMaximumVolumeSliderImage(UIImage?, for: UIControl.State)
items.desc: Assigns a maximum volume slider image to the specified control states.

items.name: func setMinimumVolumeSliderImage(UIImage?, for: UIControl.State)
items.desc: Assigns a minimum volume slider image to the specified control states.

items.name: func setVolumeThumbImage(UIImage?, for: UIControl.State)
items.desc: Assigns a thumb image to the specified control states.

items.name: func volumeSliderRect(forBounds: CGRect) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the drawing rectangle for the slider’s track.

items.name: func volumeThumbImage(for: UIControl.State) -> UIImage?
items.desc: Returns the thumb image associated with the specified control state.

items.name: func volumeThumbRect(forBounds: CGRect, volumeSliderRect: CGRect, value: Float) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the drawing rectangle for the volume slider’s thumb image.

items.name: var volumeWarningSliderImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The image used to designate the European Union volume limit.
